Interface DBManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseController

    public interface DBManager
    Interface for managing data addition to the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSector(java.lang.String name)
      Adds a new sector to the database.
      void addStock(java.lang.String ticker, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String sector)
      Adds a new stock/company to the database.
      void addStockHistory(Stock stock)
      Adds the current information about a particular stock: value, price change etc to the database.
      void addStockQuery(java.lang.String stockName)
      Records that a stock has been queried at a particular time.

    • Method Detail

      • addStock

        void addStock(java.lang.String ticker,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String sector)
        Adds a new stock/company to the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the stock/company to add.
        sector - The name of the sector the stock is a part of

      • addStockHistory

        void addStockHistory(Stock stock)
        Adds the current information about a particular stock: value, price change etc to the database.
        Parameters:
        stock - the stock info to add: Stock class

      • addStockQuery

        void addStockQuery(java.lang.String stockName)
        Records that a stock has been queried at a particular time.
        Parameters:
        stockName - The name of the stock that has been queried.

      • addSector

        void addSector(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a new sector to the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sector to add.
